mapper.insert: insert into ls_case (user_id, description, county_id, address, desc_imgs, create_time) values (#{userId}, #{description}, #{countyId}, #{address}, #{descImgs}, #{createTime})
insert into ls_user_case (user_id, case_id, create_time) values (#{userId}, #{caseId}, #{createTime})
mapper.select:
select ls_case.*,ls_user.phone,ls_user.wx_code from ls_case, ls_user
ls_case.user_id = ls_user.id
and (ls_user.user_name like CONCAT ('%', #{searchValue}, '%') or ls_case.description like CONCAT ('%',#{searchValue},'%') or ls_case.address like CONCAT ('%',#{searchValue},'%'))
and ls_case.available = '1'
order by ls_case.create_time desc

select ls_case.*,ls_user.phone,ls_user.wx_code from ls_case, ls_user, ls_user_case
ls_case.user_id = ls_user.id and ls_case.id = ls_user_case.case_id and ls_user_case.user_id = #{userId} and ls_case.available = '1'
order by ls_case.create_time desc
